#Pipes
CTRL + SHIFT + M

```{r}
tourism |> 
  filter(State == 'Victoria', Region == 'Lakes') |> 
  as_tibble() |> 
  group_by(Purpose) |> 
  summarise(media = mean(Trips))
```

```{r}
tourism |> 
  filter(State == 'Victoria', Region == 'Lakes') |> 
  autoplot(Trips) + 
  facet_wrap(vars(Purpose), scale = 'free_y') +
  theme(legend.position = 'none')
```

```{r}
tourism |> 
  filter(State == 'Victoria', Region == 'Lakes') |> 
  write_csv('Victoria.csv')
```
